title: Hurricane - Livestock Preparation Before the Storm

subtasks: Ensuring vaccinations are up to date
Implementing unique animal identification (e.g., hot brands, USDA tags, electronic tags)
Storing feed and water securely (at least one to two weeks' supply)
Protecting well water sources (having hand pumps or generators)
Prioritizing animals for evacuation (e.g., those near birthing)
Moving animals to higher ground if in flood-prone areas
Ensuring barn security for livestock safety during storms
